title: Ancient Civilizations, UFOs and Nukes - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/22/18
itunes:title: Ancient Civilizations, UFOs and Nukes - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/22/18
description:
George Noory and archeologist Michael Cremo examine his research into ancient texts that suggest advanced civilizations existed on Earth millions of years ago and may have been destroyed in a nuclear war.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
